text: Harry Augustus George Daniels (25 June 1920 – 2002) was an English professional footballer who played as a half-back in the Football League for Queens Park Rangers, Brighton & Hove Albion and York City, and in non-League football for Kensington Sports and Dover. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:Footballers from Kensington Category:2002 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Queens Park Rangers F.C. players Category:Brighton & Hove Albion F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:Dover F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Harry Daniels (footballer)
